name: Slider by BestWebSoft
author: BestWebSoft

sections.description:
Simple WordPress slider plugin which adds responsive and fully functional sliders to your website posts, pages, and widgets. Add an unlimited number of images from your WordPress Media Library, create and configure slides, set captions, and URLs.

Create beautiful slider that fits all your needs!

View Demo

Features

  • Create and configure an unlimited number of fully responsive sliders
  • Add an unlimited number of:
    • Images
    • Videos (WebM, MP4, Ogg)
    • Slider Categories
  • Add Slider via shortcode to:
    • Posts
    • Pages
    • Widgets
  • Change the number of images visible per slide
  • Enable and configure navigation options for each slider:
    • Loop
    • Navigation arrows
    • Dots
  • Configure an autoplay option:
    • Pause on mouse hover
    • Set autoplay speed
  • Compatible with Car Rental V2
  • Add custom code via plugin settings page
  • Compatible with latest WordPress version
  • Incredibly simple settings for fast setup without modifying code
  • Detailed step-by-step documentation and videos
  • Multilingual and RTL ready

sections.installation:
1. Upload the slider-bws folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  3. Click ‘Add New’ in the ‘Sliders’ menu and fill out your page.
  4. You can adjust the necessary settings using your WordPress admin panel in “Sliders” > “Global Settings” and in “Settings” tabs from current slider.
  5. Create a page or a post and insert the shortcode [print_sldr id=] or [print_sldr cat_id=] into the text.
sections.faq:
How the slide animate function works?

Animate functions work only with one item.

What video formats does the slider support?

At the moment slider support these formats: WebM, MP4, Ogg.

How can I add Slider to my website?

You should paste the shortcode [print_sldr id=] or [print_sldr cat_id=] into your page or post.

How to change image order in the slideshow?

Please open the menu “Sliders” and choose a slider from the list. It will take you to the slider editing page. Use the drag and drop function to change the order of the images and do not forget to save the page.

I have some problems with the plugin’s work. What Information should I provide to receive proper support?

Please make sure that the problem hasn’t been discussed yet on our forum (https://support.bestwebsoft.com). If no, please provide the following data along with your problem’s description:

  • The link to the page where the problem occurs.
  • The name of the plugin and its version. If you are using a pro version – your order number.
  • The version of your WordPress installation.
  • Copy and paste into the message your system status report. Please read more here: Instruction on System Status.
